body: They're childhood friends, and he saved her from bullying when they're younger, but not like he did it from kindness, and she didn't fall in love to him, but rather hate how he always look down on her. Even now, she's like those gloomy protagonist who only got friends in internet and refuse to get out of the house unless they really need to. So, she probably just enjoy having a dominant position now, after how he treated her for years.
This story about nerd girl teasing a delinquent men. Interesting.
More specific to the femdom niche rather than the vanilla/ntr duality in my opinion. She did steal him from his girlfriend.
